title: I’m a Broken Man Pretending To Be a Real Person, and I’m Willing To Stay Broken. My Childhood Friend Made Fun of My Classmate Who Is Writing My Favorite Novel. I Don’t Care About My Childhood Friend Anymore - Novel Updates
tags: Artists   Bullying   Childhood Friends   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Writers
author: Usako   うさこ
description:
“He’s sick.”

Mom cried when she heard the doctor’s words.

I didn’t understand why she was crying.

In order to keep her from crying, I pretended to be normal and recovered from my illness.

I became friends with my classmates, and when we went to karaoke, they disappeared, leaving me and girl behind.

I saw the girl being made fun of in the classroom, and for the first time, I took an interest in people. I tried to get involved with the girl myself.

My childhood friend, who had been making fun of me behind my back, stopped me.

“Hey, don’t turn into what you used to be!”

“—-I’m a convenient childhood friend who pays the bills. You said you didn’t like me because I was annoying. Then stay the hell away from me.”

A coming-of-age love story about a sober girl who’s a hidden novelist, and a guy who loves nothing more than drawing pictures, both of whom are trying to become manga artists!>
